name: WIR-E
description:
WIR-E, time to charge up!

You play as a WIR-E, old but robust small service robot who currently doesn't have anything else to do, than find small floating orbs of NextLevel! 

Controls:
WASD - move
Q / E - Rotate camera
ESC - options
Mouse in menus
Controls are camera related, so regardless of cameras angle.

Object of the game:
Goal is to touch the floating orb of NextLevel. You have limited time in each level, but you can charge up the time by walking into charging pad. Use different camera angles to find your way through small labyrinths and to locate buttons which will help you to progress in levels.

--

More info coming soon, check dev log for more info what is coming in near future! Game will get updates past gamejam.
